channel.title: Polling Sensor - polling twice always
channel.description:
I mean to say - my polling sensor is polling twice at the same instance of time ... I doubt two instances of the sensor are running at the same time ...
Can anyone help how can i stop the current polling sensor and restart it.

item.title: Polling Sensor - polling twice always
item.dc:creator: armab
item.description:
Yes, you need to run only single replica of the sensor.

You can check the running linux processes to check if there are any unexpected copies.

Read full topic

item.title: Polling Sensor - polling twice always
item.dc:creator: NaveenKrishna
item.description:
If sensor is ran in Debug mode - will it create a new instance of the existing one?

Read full topic
